actions.doLocalize(): Do localisation, i.e. reduce the uncertainty of the robot's position.
actions.doExplore(): During exploration Grumpy goes trhough the workspace looking for objects and boxes until he has found at least one object and its corresponding box.
actions.doMoveToGoal(goal): Move to the goal position (pickup or box for dropoff).
actions.doPickup(): Pick the object up with the arm (here the robot is stationary and only the arm is moving).
actions.doPlace(): Place the object in the box.

conditions.isValidPath: Check if there is a valid path between current position and goal position.
conditions.isPicked: Check to see if the object was actually picked up.
conditions.isPlaced: Check to see if the object was actually placed.
conditions.isDone: Check if all objects have been picked up.
